system.description: Rocky ground, stone floors, and similar surfaces grow dozens of sharp, hard spikes. The spikes deal 1d8 points of piercing damage to any creature moving into or through the area. Movement through the area is at half speed. A creature that runs or charges through takes 1d8 per 5 feet of movement. The spikes are hard to notice (Search DC 20) and can be disabled (Disable Device DC 20).
